abilities.desc:
2x damage vs confused. Enemies
take 2x confusion damage.

name: Mind's Eye
abilities.desc:
Hits Ghost-type Pokémon.
Accuracy can't be lowered.

name: Blood Price
abilities.desc:
Does 30% more damage but

name: Spike Armor
abilities.desc:
30% chance to bleed
on contact or offense.

name: Voodoo Power
abilities.desc:
30% chance to bleed when
hit by special attacks.

name: Chrome Coat
abilities.desc:
Reduces special damage taken by
40%, but decreases Speed by 10%.

name: Banshee
abilities.desc:
Normal sound moves become
Ghost and get a 1.2x boost.

name: Web Spinner
abilities.desc:
Uses String Shot
on switch-in.

name: Showdown Mode
abilities.desc: Combines Ambush & Violent Rush.

name: Seed Sower
abilities.desc:

name: Airborne
abilities.desc:
Boosts own & ally's Flying-type

name: Parroting
abilities.desc:

name: Salt Circle
abilities.desc:

name: Purifying Salt
abilities.desc:
Immune to status conditions.

name: Protosynthesis
abilities.desc:
Boosts highest stat in Sun

name: Quark Drive
abilities.desc:
Boosts highest stat in Electric

name: Wind Power

name: Impulse

Non-contact moves use the

name: Terminal Velocity

Special moves use 20% of its

name: Guard Dog
abilities.desc:

name: Anger Shell
abilities.desc:

name: Egoist
abilities.desc:

name: Subdue
abilities.desc:

name: Readied Action
abilities.desc:
Doubles attack on

name: Stygian Rush
abilities.desc:

name: Guilt Trip

name: Tidal Rush
abilities.desc:
At full HP, gives +1 priority to

name: Zero To Hero
abilities.desc:

name: Costar
abilities.desc:

name: Commander
abilities.desc:

name: Tactical Retreat
abilities.desc: Flees when stats are lowered.

name: Vengeful Spirit
abilities.desc:

name: Cud Chew

name: Armor Tail

name: Mind Crunch

name: Supreme Overlord

name: Ill Will

name: Fire Scales
abilities.desc:

name: Watch Your Step
abilities.desc:

name: Rapid Response
abilities.desc:
Boosts Speed by 50% + SpAtk

name: Sharp Edges
abilities.desc: 1/6 HP damage when touched.

name: Thermal Exchange
abilities.desc:

name: Good As Gold

Immune to all Status moves,

name: Sharing Is Caring

name: Tablets Of Ruin

name: Beads Of Ruin

name: Thick Skin

Super-effective moves.

name: Gallantry

name: Orichalcum Pulse

name: Sun Basking

name: Winged King
abilities.desc: Ups “supereffective” by 33%.

name: Hadron Engine
abilities.desc:

name: Iron Serpent
abilities.desc: Ups “supereffective” by 33%.

name: Catastrophe

name: Blademaster

name: Olé!

30% chance to evade single-

name: Malicious

name: Brawling Wyvern

name: Balloon Bomb

name: Rockhard Will

name: Fragrant Daze

name: Snow Song

name: Greater Spirit

name: Resonance

name: Cute Antecedence

name: Shallow Gravezz

name: Rhythmic

name: Arc Flash

name: Unicorn

name: Pretentious

name: Draco Morale

name: Fluffiest

name: Atomic Punch

name: Master Hand

name: Slipstream

Moves use 20% of its Speed

name: Apex Predator

name: Rage Point
